subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object defining the UI component's configuration properties.

subMembers.name: keyStep
subMembers.description: Specifies the step by which a handle moves when a user presses **Page Up** or **Page Down**.

subMembers.name: format
subMembers.description: Formats a value before it is displayed in a label.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: Configures the labels displayed at the min and max values.

subMembers.name: position
subMembers.description: Specifies whether labels are over or under the scale.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Specifies whether slider labels are visible.

subMembers.name: showRange
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to highlight the selected range.

subMembers.name: step
subMembers.description: Specifies the step by which the UI component's value changes when a user drags a handler.

subMembers.name: enabled
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a tooltip is enabled.

subMembers.name: position
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a tooltip is over or under the slider.

subMembers.name: showMode
subMembers.description: Specifies when the UI component shows a tooltip.

subMembers.name: valueChangeMode
subMembers.description: Specifies when to change the component's [value].
